headline: Cava, Shake Shack gain fans, Starbucks & Chipotle lose: Survey
summary: Restaurant stocks are in focus after Evercore published a survey on consumer preferences showing attitudes toward restaurants. Fast casual restaurants like Sweetgreen (SG), Cava (CAVA), and Shake Shack (SHAK), are among the biggest net gainers of consumer fans since 2019. On the other hand, Starbucks (SBUX) and Chipotle (CMG) have been some names losing fans in the past five years. Brian Sozzi and Brad Smith break down consumer sentiment about the restaurant space heading into 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

headline: Will 2025 Be the Watershed Year for Return-to-Office Mandates? That Depends.
summary: Years after the Covid-19 pandemic normalized remote work, recent developments have executives wondering which companies will pull staff back to the office next—and who will benefit.
